monsters.family_name_jp: マムル, あなぐらマムル, 洞窟マムル
monsters.family_desc_en:
Mascot monster of the Shiren series.
Cave Mamels in Shiren 2 have somewhat lower defense than in other games.

monsters.family_name_jp: チンタラ, ちゅうチンタラ, おおチンタラ
monsters.family_desc_en:
The secondary mascot monster of the Shiren series.
A notable characteristic is that it grows larger for each increase in rank.

monsters.family_name_jp: ピコタン, ポコタン, パコタン
monsters.family_desc_en:
A unique monster that breaks traps and statues in a single hit.
This ability is beneficial for most dungeons, but can prove to be a nuisance in Halfway Well (Trap dungeon).
Higher ranks can only naturally be found in Halfway Well.
Only breaks traps that it can see, so it won't break traps that are only visible to Shiren from eating Sight Grass or equipping a Trapper Bracelet.

notes: Moves toward traps and statues if Shiren isn't present.
notes_ally: Special attack breaks traps in front of it.
Can break statues in a single hit.

monsters.family_name_jp: マルジロウ, マルジロウ兄, マルジロウ父
monsters.family_desc_en:
Monster that resembles an armadillo.
Occasionally rolls into a ball and tackles Shiren, making him trip and drop items.
Particularly troublesome when there is water, because items dropped in water may be unrecoverable without items such as Evaporate Scroll.
Carrying a Balance Staff will prevent tripping, as long as it's not inside a Pot.
monsters.ally_desc_en: Armordillo's special attack will make a monster drop 1 item. The ability to rapidly obtain items is so powerful that it's said if you can catch an Armordillo Pop inside the Road to the End dungeon, you're pretty much guaranteed to clear it. The dropped items are selected from the current floor's item table. Note that Gamarra monsters will always drop Gitan.

notes: Tackles Shiren, making him trip and drop items.
Tackle deals 4 damage and 1 tile of knockback.
notes_ally: Tackles an enemy to make them trip and drop an item.
Tackle deals 4 damage and 1 tile of knockback.

notes: Tackle deals 6 damage and 2 tiles of knockback.
notes_ally: Tackle deals 6 damage and 2 tiles of knockback.

notes: Tackle deals 10 damage and 3 tiles of knockback.
notes_ally: Tackle deals 10 damage and 3 tiles of knockback.

monsters.family_name_jp: スイテキマル, ジライヤ, ショウカンマル, ダイジライヤ

notes: Attempts to drop a trap when defeated.
Trap drop takes priority over synthesis seals like 飯 and 銭.
notes_ally: Special attack drops a Droplet Trap and warps away.
Special attack drops a Landmine and warps away.
Special attack drops a Summon Trap and warps away.
Special attack drops a Big Landmine and warps away.

monsters.family_name_jp: Mr.ブーン, Mr.ヘリコ, Mr.ジャイロ

notes_ally: Can also warp using its special attack.

monsters.family_name_jp: 岩獣ズドン, 岩獣ガガン, 岩獣ドガガーン

notes: Performs a tackle that sends a target flying until they hit a wall or waterway.
notes_ally: Performs a tackle that sends a target flying until they hit a wall.

notes: If the target collides with a breakable wall, they will be sent into the wall by 2 tiles.
notes_ally: If the target collides with a breakable wall, they will be sent into the wall by 2 tiles.

notes: If the target collides with a breakable wall, they will be sent into the wall by 5 tiles.
notes_ally: If the target collides with a breakable wall, they will be sent into the wall by 5 tiles.

monsters.family_name_jp: ものまね仮面, ふるまいカブリ, なりきりマスク
シューベル, メンベルス, ベルトーベン
ドスコーイ, ハッキョーイ, ゴッツァーン
ケンゴウ, イアイ, シハン
